description.value:
A Character who possesses or who has access to this book gains +10 to Commerce Tests, and may spend a Fate Point to pass any Scrutiny Tests made during Financial Negotiations with 1d5 Degrees of Success.

Requirements

A Tome that contains thousands of legal rulings and opinions of Jurists, Scholars, and magisters pertaining to trade.

Effect: Average

Notes: -
